message.body: I'm sincerely thinking about not going to my chem lab tomorrow to study. I seriously thought I was going to have off today. I didn't study much :(
But you'd have to make it up! Don't do it!
No I wouldn't! She said that if we couldn't come to let her know and she would just put a note not to average that lab into our grades. The main thing is that we had to let her know.
Haha. Ahhhh fudge it. I'll just go. Whatevs.
Ohhh shoot. Id be tempted too then haha
Right?!?! I don't know what to do. And I don't know what to tell her. What would you say?
Eh I'd probably go just to have another grade because it only gets harder haha but I would have definitely put some serious thought into it because lab sucks
I know. And she said tomorrow's lab is the longest one.
Ughhhh lol
I know. Ughh!!
Oh goodness gracias. She MIGHT move our exam!!!
Sweeet
I know. I'm really hoping that she does. Although, she's making me nervous cause she said "it might not be Thursday in class, but it might still be Thursday." What...in...the....world.
Online?
I guess but I don't know how.
Although, it would make it easier for me cause then I can study during the day and take it at night.
....she's giving us a take home exam on Thursday that is due on Monday!
YAYAYAYAYAYAYAY!
Hahahaha awesooome
So, I'm in the crisis center. This guy is screaming "Mary mother of god! Get me into a unit! Father, son, Holy Spirit! 5 hours!!! Mary mother of god!" Lol it's sad but funny at the same time
Probably eat at home
Hahahahahahahaha!!!!!! That's hilarious! Are you eating dinner at home? Or did you eat?
Okay. I'll wait for you then.
Lol this guy is HYSTERICAL. "You're giving me placebos! I can taste it! It's all sugar!!"
What about the tiles?
Mommy and opa are currently fighting. It's because of the tiles. Just a heads up.
Opa wants to put the tiles on and got mad at mommy when she said she didn't want them cause they were ugly.
Oh I told him that too lol
I dunno. Also, for two years running, philly wears sweatpants more than any other city. I'm totally guilty.
Haha how do they even know that
